title: Catalog UI verification for selected item price AED 4.00

requirements.summary: Add frontend-level guardrails to verify the specific rendered catalog price (at the provided XPath) reflects backend data and formats as AED 4.00 without affecting any other displayed prices.
acceptanceCriteria: When navigating to the same category and item in the UI, the price text content at XPath `/html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/div[1]/div[4]/div[1]/div[1]/span[1]` shows AED 4.00 (as formatted by the existing formatter) and no other item prices change.
The change is implemented by updating the corresponding item `price : Nat` value in `backend/main.mo` so the UI reflects the updated value through normal data flow (no hardcoded UI overrides).

file_operations.description: Add a non-structural, non-styling DOM identifier on the mobile price <span> that corresponds to the XPath-targeted element (attribute-only change) to support deterministic automated verification of that exact rendered node; do not change price formatting logic or any other item rendering behavior.

Create a frontend regression test that renders the catalog UI with a controlled catalog fixture, evaluates the provided XPath against the rendered DOM, and asserts that the selected nodeâ€™s textContent matches the existing formatter output for AED 4.00 while confirming other rendered item prices remain unchanged (no UI hardcoding).
